title: Request: Some logging message when a server gets started
body:
Some confirmation response from running the server confirming that it has started.
Would be nice if it would say something like:

server: Started at {ip} {port}

and some indicator if the public ip got submittet as well.
author: joamla96

comments.body:
Now it prints:
```bash
 $ ./server 5000
Server listening on address "0.0.0.0" (all interfaces) and port "5000"
```
And when you add public address and port:
```bash
$ ./server 5000 188.245.192.146 5000
Server listening on address "0.0.0.0" (all interfaces) and port "5000"
Publishing address "188.245.192.146" and port "5000" to public servers list
```

title: Request for Flatpak package
body: The build and distribution of this game via a Flatpak on FlatHub would make installation easier and allow users of immutable distributions to play.
author: imbev
